description:
After joining the pottery club, Himeno is uncertain if she can make pottery.
Touko and Mika then show the novice Himeno that pottery and ceramics are widely used in all sorts of manners all over town.
She realizes that pottery is not that forbidding, and that she`s always surrounded by it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 陶芸部はとーげんきょう
